mapper.insert: /*TestInsertMapper.insertInOrd*/ insert cwt_in_ord_mst ( cust_id, wh_id, in_ord_no, in_ord_dt, in_ord_type, in_method, reg_date ) values ( #{inOrdVO.custId}, #{inOrdVO.whId}, #{inOrdVO.inOrdNo}, #{inOrdVO.inOrdDt}, #{inOrdVO.inOrdType}, #{inOrdVO.inMethod}, now() )

/*TestInsertMapper.insertOutOrd*/ insert cwt_out_ord_mst ( cust_id, out_ord_no, out_ord_dt, out_type, out_method, reg_date ) values ( #{outOrdVO.custId}, #{outOrdVO.outOrdNo}, #{outOrdVO.outOrdDt}, #{outOrdVO.outType}, #{outOrdVO.outMethod}, now() )

/*TestInsertMapper.insertUser*/ insert cwt_user ( cmp_id, mid, use_term_yn, personal_info_term_yn, cfms_service_term_yn, marketing_term_yn, first_join_yn, member_type_code, mobile, reg_date ) values ( #{joinVO.cmpId}, #{joinVO.mid}, 'N', 'N', 'N', 'N', 'Y', #{joinVO.memberTypeCode}, #{joinVO.mobile}, now() )
